  ## Description

  A weather forecasting app.

  ### Built With

  HTML, JS, Tailwind, OpenWeather Weather API

  ## Installation

  Visit https://jbradley84.github.io/weather-dashboard/ to use the app.

  ## Usage

  Type cities, click buttons.

  ## Contributing

  They can't.

  Test it.
